nodes.bodyText: Do you think we could get rid of all these Thread.sleep 😃 ? We're clearly waiting for something to happen here - can we use awaitility again for it, or is this something that's not observable?
I would love to. But this is not possible since there is no really a thing we can verify. I was really close to just drop the sleeps. And also the last part which says "is never removed" 😅
If you agree then I would just drop this part.
Ah, so it just waits to make sure that nodes are not removed if nothing happens?
